item.title: Sonoff POW
item.description: Preparing hardware We need to access VCC RT TX and GND pins, to facilitate it we weld pins to the sonoff pcb To connect the sonoff to the PC we’re using a USB UART TTL 3.3V Converter/Programmer (e.g. CP2102, CH340G, FT232, PL2303) The schema of the connections is: Programmer Sonoff 3.3/VCC 3.3/VCC TX RX RX TX GND GND WARNING!
